page.title: 17Old Gillingham
page.content: One highlight of our area is Gillingham Green. A long time ago it was the centre of Gillingham and indeed its church, St. Mary's, was where Will Adams was baptised.It's ancient cemetery is now a park. The other highlight is Gillingham Football Club, which is doing well in the Third Division. It has a famous 100 year old stand, sadly due for demolition because of the Bradford City fire disaster. Our section is split by a busy railway line, that used to convey chalk from the local quarry, which eventually became the town dump and is now being turned into playing fields.
